did.unittitle: Kathy Andrade Collection of ILGWU and UNITE Quilts Memorabilia,
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection is made up of 4 hand made quilts. Three of these quilts are made up of collections of pictures taken of UNITE and ILGWU rallys. The fourth quilt is made up of small replicas of (doll size) dresses and outfits.

scopecontent.p: This collection is made up of 4 hand made quilts. Three of these quilts are made up of collections of pictures taken of UNITE and ILGWU rallys. The fourth quilt is made up of small replicas of (doll size) dresses and outfits.

controlaccess.corpname: Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers Union --Collectibles

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Kathy Andrade Collection of ILGWU and UNITE Quilts Memorabilia #6299 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Picture included in box - assorted photos used to make a banner
picture included in box - assorted photos make up the banner (each banner is different)
